dsOverview.title: GATE Commercial and Research Aircraft Observations

summary.p: This dataset contains flight-level aircraft data collected during the GARP Atlantic Tropical Experiment (GATE) from commercial and research aircraft. The GATE period was from June to September 1974.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UCAR/NCAR/CGD > Climate and Global Dynamics Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Altitude > Barometric Altitude
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Flight Level Winds
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
